intro.p: The GStreamer team is pleased to announce the first release of the unstable 1.9 release series. The 1.9 release series is adding new features on top of the 1.0, 1.2, 1.4, 1.6 and 1.8 series and is part of the API and ABI-stable 1.x release series of the GStreamer multimedia framework. The unstable 1.9 release series will lead to the stable 1.10 release series in the next weeks. Any newly added API can still change until that point.
Binaries for Android, iOS, Mac OS X and Windows will be provided in the next days.

p.i: "Such ingratitude. After all the times I've saved your life."

intro.p: A collection of plugins you'd want to have right next to you on the battlefield. Shooting sharp and making no mistakes, these plugins have it all: good looks, good code, and good licensing. Documented and dressed up in tests. If you're looking for a role model to base your own plugin on, here it is.

If you find a plot hole or a badly lip-synced line of code in them, let us know - it is a matter of honour for us to ensure Blondie doesn't look like he's been walking 100 miles through the desert without water.

This module contains a set of plugins that we consider to have good quality code, correct functionality, our preferred license (LGPL for the plugin code, LGPL or LGPL-compatible for the supporting library). We believe distributors can safely ship these plugins. People writing elements should base their code on these elements.

Other modules containing plugins are:
gst-plugins-base contains a basic set of well-supported plugins gst-plugins-ugly contains a set of well-supported plugins, but might pose problems for distributors gst-plugins-bad contains a set of less supported plugins that haven't passed the rigorous quality testing we expect, or are still missing documentation and/or unit tests gst-libav contains a set of codecs plugins based on libav (formerly gst-ffmpeg)

bug.summary: flvmux: Ensure we fallback to DTS when clipping
qtdemux: Various SEGMENT event related fixes, including regression fixes
Can't playback LPCM data via HTTP after playing back something else
souphttpsrc: rewrite using new session/request API
JPEG2000 RTP video streaming problem
qtdemux: Add the function to get channels and sample rate for AAC
multifilesrc: set position as offset from start-index
qtdemux: PIFF box parsing support
splitmuxsrc: add " format-location " signal as a way to specify arbitrarily named files as input
rtpj2kdepay: can't sync to a start code and never outputs
v4l2object: probe colorspace supported by device
Avimux: Add support for PNG images
rtpsession: don't lock while emitting the stats signal
rtpsession: Add new signal 'on-app-rtcp'
rtpjitterbuffer: Add RFC7273 media clock handling
rtpjpegdepay may push buffers before setting output caps
sdp: Add new sdpsrc element and some sdpdemux bugfixes
rtpjitterbuffer: Performance improvements
good plugins: use new gst_element_class_add_static_pad_template()
gst-launch of 8-channel deinterleave pipeline stalls
deinterlace: Add " auto " fields mode
qtdemux: Modify data type of duration in handle_src_query function
qtdemux: Add check condition for fail case in get_duration function
rtpmanager: Set to initial value for 'ntpns' in get_current_times()
matroskamux: make timecodescale configurable
ximageutil: shouldn't implement transform if don't support it
qtdemux: Incorrect handling of video file which has an internal rate not equal to 1
rtp j2k payload/depayload messes up colours in sample pattern
v4l2object: use G_SELECTION instead of G_CROP in gst_v4l2_object_acquire_format
v4l2object: fill colorimetry in gst_v4l2_object_acquire_format
rtpjitterbuffer: Accept streams with non-TIME segments.
gst-plugins-good: fix leaks in various tests
souphttpsrc: fix buffer leak when flushing
aacparse: sticky event criticals with RTL HD mpeg-ts stream
good: fix leaks in tests
dvdemux: Pass-through buffer DISCONT flags and recalculate frame offsets when needed
matroskademux: preserve seek flags
rtpsource: complete warn log with SSRC
qtdemux: Handle upstream GAP in push-mode/time segment
rtpjitterbuffer: fix RTPJitterBufferMode documentation
rtph264pay: Deprecated sprop-parameter-set property
Build error: gstrtpj2kpay.c:364:21: error: implicit truncation from 'int' to bitfield changes value from -1 to 65535
souphttpsrc: use dynamic blocksize
make check fail in " elements/splitmux " if theora or ogg plugins are not available
flvdemux: Add support for H263 and MPEG4 part2
rtspsrc: protocols aren't reset after rtsp redirect
rtspsrc: always fill all srtp encoder properties
